experiment.author: Hantang Liu and Shaiful Alam
experiment.description: Ask participants to perform the selection tasks without invoking the novice mode.If they do it we will give score 1 to them and maximize it to encourage participants.If they invoke the novice mode then they will get 0. The participants will do the same task in grouping Flower menus and original flower menus. In this way we can cpmpare which menu is better.
experiment.name: Comparing original Flower menus and grouping Flower menus

factor.name: Number of items of the menu

measure.name: Number of items of the menu
Number of times the novice mode is invoked
